high_descs: Turn to the dresser on your right.
Pick up the box of tissues.
Turn and go to the lamp in the corner on your left.
anns.task_desc: Look at the box of tissues under the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and move to the dresser.
Pick up the box of tissues from the dresser.
Head to the lamp at the left of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a box of tissues by the light of a tall lamp.

high_descs: Walk to the right and reach cross to the wooded brown dresser with the computer.
Grab the tissue paper from the dresser.
walk over to the right for two paces as you reach the corner lamp.
Carry the tissue as you turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: To perform an task using both hands.
